lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer needed 37 pitches to get through the first inning of his second spring training start but allowed just one run Tuesday in the Washington Nationals' 4-2 win over the Houston Astros.

headline.main: Nats' Scherzer Struggles Through 37-Pitch Inning vs Astros
headline.print_headline: Nats' Scherzer Struggles Through 37-Pitch Inning vs Astros

snippet: Max Scherzer needed 37 pitches to get through the first inning of his second spring training start but allowed just one run Tuesday in the Washington Nationals' 4-2 win over the Houston Astros.
